content: {"locationId": "4877", "organizationId": "4098", "name": "Giving Hands Food Pantry", "address1": "2160 Church Street", "address2": "", "city": "Covington", "state": "GA", "zipCode": "30014", "country": null, "phone": "770-786-7305", "phoneExt": "1", "website": "https://www.covingtonfirst.org/givinghands", "latitude": "33.59266", "longitude": "-83.85967", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution, Pop-Up/Mobile Resource", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Butts, Jasper, Newton, COUNTY:  Newton Jasper and Butts counties only", "languages": "English", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Giving Hands Food Pantry's mission is to end hunger in our community, while increasing guest choice and dignity, and minimizing food waste.  We serve all residents of Newton, Jasper, and Butts Counties ONLY .  Households may visit Giving Hands Food Pantry once a calendar month .  Please bring a photo ID with you each time you come . We encourage our guests to make an appointment to receive assistance. Appointments can be made online on  our website , in person, or over the phone. Our office hours are Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday from 9 AM - 1 PM. All voicemails will be returned during our next scheduled office hours. Questions can also be emailed to foodpantryassistant@covingtonfirst.org.", "notes": "Guest parking is located in the church's parking lot or on the food pantry's side of Church Street . Please do not park on the residential side of Church Street or in the gravel parking lot for staff and volunteers.
